p: Chemical characterization using TLC, FT-IR, NMR and LC-MS found that the indigenous strain P. maritimus SAMP produces BS having sugar and lipid moieties. Therefore, the term ‘terpene containing BS’ is denoted to the BS produced by Planococcus sp. Therefore, we speculate that terpene BS produced by Planococcus have significant contribution in the field of BS produced by diverse marine microbes.
